review: 4.5 stars, actually!I watch a lot of series and some movies - with a set budget for tv as my entertainment. I considered for a long time before purchasing this, because I have 2 portable devices and have always just watched on those.  But I wanted to have the experience of a larger screen, with better audio and the benefit of being farther from my face ;).  I had some trepidation because I have a ten year old TV without HD.  I found the Fire Stick installation a snap, and the small remote is straightforward and easy to use.  All the content that's available on my portable device is now viewable on the big(ger) screen!  Awesome.I only wish I could magnify the font size, as an "over 50", it's hard to read.  I usually peruse titles on my laptop or kindle and save them to my Prime or Netfilx watchlist, then click easily to it on my TV.  I think picture quality would be better on an HDTV, it's a little dark.Best money I've spent in a long time.
